meanings.definition: Wangs (noun): Slang term for male genitalia.
meanings.sent1: He felt embarrassed when his wangs got stuck in the zipper.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined his wangs during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his wangs had a mind of their own.
meanings.sent4: The boxer took a hard hit to his wangs in the match.
meanings.sent5: The statue's wangs were sculpted with great detail.

meanings.definition: Wangs (verb): To swing or shake rapidly.
meanings.sent1: The branches wangs in the wind during the storm.
meanings.sent2: She wangs the jump rope with skill and precision.
meanings.sent3: The dancer wangs her hips to the beat of the music.
meanings.sent4: The flag wangs proudly in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The pendulum wangs back and forth in a hypnotic rhythm.

meanings.definition: Wangs (adjective): Describing something as large or impressive.
meanings.sent1: The wangs mansion stood at the end of the street.
meanings.sent2: She wore a wangs diamond necklace to the gala.
meanings.sent3: The cake was a wangs masterpiece of culinary art.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display was wangs and breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range was a wangs sight to behold.
